title: pen/marker style
content:
Helping out a friend, I’ve not seen this before. Hoping someone else has.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [wegot.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060523005352/http:/typophile.com/files/wegot.jpg) | 13.61 KB |
author: evan

comments.content: Looks like Victor’s Hand to me…

Which ‘Victors Hand’ do you mean? The one I have seen is not like this. (And is really and ‘alias name’ for ‘Roel’ from the old ClickArt Handwritten fonts collection.)

- Mike Yanega
That’s not correct, I looked and the letters don’t match.

I found it as something called [‘Hand Script’](http://web.archive.org/web/20060523005352/http:/www.liongraphics.com/LGLettering.htm), but there are some misnamed fonts in this collection, so it’s possible that ‘Hand Script’ is not the correct name. (Notice Victors Hand near the bottom of the page — that is really ‘Roel’)

- Mike Yanega
It’s a Fontographer font I have called “Handwriting” which I’ll look for an online sample of. It looks like a stroke has been added though.
